summary.span: 获取或设置是否用一致 NullReference 行为的“布尔”值。

value.span: 如果应使用一致 NullReferernce 行为，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the consistent NullReference behavior should be used; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此标志设置为 `false` ，则当 FK 关系的值属性为 null 时，将其设置为 null 将不起作用。If this flag is set to `false`, then setting the Value property of the for an FK relationship to null when it is already null will have no effect. 如果此标志设置为 `true` ，则将值设置为 null 将始终导致 FK 空，并且即使值当前为 null，也会删除关系。When this flag is set to `true`, then setting the value to null will always cause the FK to be nulled and the relationship to be deleted even if the value is currently null. `false`使用 ObjectContext 和使用 DbContext 时，默认值为 `true` 。The default value is `false` when using ObjectContext and `true` when using DbContext.
